description: Manage storage blob delete-policy service properties.

commands.name: az storage blob service-properties delete-policy show
commands.syntax:
az storage blob service-properties delete-policy show [--account-key]
                                                      [--account-name]
                                                      [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                                      [--blob-endpoint]
                                                      [--connection-string]
                                                      [--sas-token]
examples: az storage blob service-properties delete-policy show --account-name mystorageccount --account-key 00000000
az storage blob service-properties delete-policy show --account-name mystorageccount --auth-mode login

commands.name: az storage blob service-properties delete-policy update
commands.syntax:
az storage blob service-properties delete-policy update [--account-key]
                                                        [--account-name]
                                                        [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                                        [--blob-endpoint]
                                                        [--connection-string]
                                                        [--days-retained]
                                                        [--enable {false, true}]
                                                        [--sas-token]
examples: az storage blob service-properties delete-policy update --account-name mystorageccount --account-key 00000000 --days-retained 7 --enable true
